00012 template <typename T>
00013 vector<vector<Point_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt(MxArray& arr)
00014 {
00015     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00016     vector<vector<Point_<T> > > vvp;
00017     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00018     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00019     {
00020         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();
00021         vector<Point_<T> > vp;
00022         vp.reserve(v.size());
00023         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00024             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint_<T>());
00025         vvp.push_back(vp);
00026     }
00027     return vvp;
00028 }

00031 template <typename T>
00032 vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt3(MxArray& arr)
00033 {
00034     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00035     vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > vvp;
00036     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00037     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00038     {
00039         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();

00041         vp.reserve(v.size());
00042         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00043             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint3_<T>());

00048 
00056 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00057                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00058 {
00059     // Check the number of arguments
00060     if (nrhs<3 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>1)
00061         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00062     
00063     // Argument vector
00064     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00065     vector<vector<Point3f> > objectPoints = MxArrayToVecVecPt3<float>(rhs[0]);
00066     vector<vector<Point2f> > imagePoints = MxArrayToVecVecPt<float>(rhs[1]);
00067     Size imageSize = rhs[2].toSize();
00068     double aspectRatio=1;
00069     for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00070         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00071         if (key=="AspectRatio")
00072             aspectRatio = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00073         else
00074             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00075     }
00076     
00077     // Process
00078     Mat m = initCameraMatrix2D(objectPoints, imagePoints, imageSize, aspectRatio);
00079     plhs[0] = MxArray(m);
00080 }
